content: lion brand pattern # cjif-aamericangrannysquarethrow corrections applied may 8 2012 skill level intermediate level 3 jiffy® article #450 3 colors 20 balls total a 450-111 heather blue 11 balls 1485 yds b 450-099 fisherman 6 balls 810 yds c 450-114 true red 3 balls 405 yds crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge each square measure 4½ inches 11 cm across solid color squares make 104 with a and 24 with b two-color squares make 48 with b and c 176 squares total work squares following color sequence assemble together following schematic provided sew adjoining edges of squares together through back loops only with matching yarn work crochet edging in color a to finish
